body: Are we allowed to place blocks where we are not supposed to? Like block placing past walls with regions where you can't place a block, but will still be able to get past. The last time I asked Auratix, he said it's allowed. Can someone confirm this?
body_tagged: Are we allowed to place blocks where we are not supposed to? Like block placing past walls with regions where you can't place a block, but will still be able to get past. The last time I asked Auratix, he said it's allowed. Can someone confirm this?
title: Is block glitching allowed?

replies.body:
I can't confirm it, so you read this for nothing.

But I think it's not.
replies.body_tagged:
I can't confirm it, so you read this for nothing.

But I think it's not.

replies.body:
If on block place you get an error message and your blocks get removed, but due to lag it stays for a small period of time and you use that amount of time the block is there to get on top of it and go into places you are not supposed to / in a way you are not supposed too, then...

It's illegal
replies.body_tagged:
If on block place you get an error message and your blocks get removed, but due to lag it stays for a small period of time and you use that amount of time the block is there to get on top of it and go into places you are not supposed to / in a way you are not supposed too, then...

It's illegal

replies.body: Like wall sprinting pass a wall? It's not going into places you are not supposed to
replies.body_tagged: Like wall sprinting pass a wall? It's not going into places you are not supposed to

replies.body: You are allowed to wall jump, but you're not allowed to place blocks if you get an error message in chat.
replies.body_tagged: You are allowed to wall jump, but you're not allowed to place blocks if you get an error message in chat.

replies.body:
Since it's not in the rules section, I would say it's allowed, although staff probably claim it's not.
If it is a rule, they should add it to the rules.

replies.body:
Abusing glitches has always been illegal.
Also, try staying away from areas where the Map Developer has not intended gameplay to take place.

replies.body:
Yep, He's in your team.

According to Kylo, the same rules should be applied in Scrim servers, so that means he could get an infraction for it.
